entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.content:

  • Little Hero Costume Packageï¼šâ‚º1.199,99
  • Black Dark Lord Skin Packageï¼šâ‚º349,99
  • White Dark Lord Skin Packageï¼šâ‚º349,99
  • Awakening Viper Packageï¼šâ‚º229,99
  • Myth full packï¼šâ‚º1.799,99

Application Description

Prepare for battle - a mob of heroes is about to invade your territory! Build traps facilities in your dungeon, hire monsters, discover relics with mysterious power, and protect your dungeon from heroes that came to take you down. â—† CONTENTS - 9 Dark Lords with special skills! - 300+ monsters and heroes - 100+ traps and facilities for your dungeon - 200+ relics with mysterious power - Various EVENTS filled with surprises - Various elements that can be unlocked throughout gameplay - and moreâ€¦! We are planning to add more Dark Lords, traps, monsters, and more game modes! â—† CREATE YOUR OWN DUNGEON Think carefully when placing traps, facilities, and monsters into your dungeon. Strong strategy will help you survive the swarm of heroes and allow you to unlock more elements for your dungeon. May your dungeon endure the bravest heroes there are! â—† EXPLORE YOUR FATE Choose your fate from a selection of fate cards every day. If you wish to battle, heroes will come, and if you wish for surprises, a special event will take place. Choose the fate you want as the master of your dungeon. -SUPPORT- E-Mail : support@gamecoaster.com Tel :+82 10-4178-0283

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: DayCost Pro - Personal Finance
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º129,99 â†’ Free [Free ~ â‚º129,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

Three seconds a bill. Fast, Security and Easy to use is our aim, and iOS notification center widget. Look at other people how to say: â— I just downloaded this app and I am so loving it already! It seems easy to use but I need to explore it more. â— Very innovative work. Keep up guys. 5 star app. â— It's quick to note down your expenses and helps you track your money. â— Polished, smart, simple, with all functions of apps of this kind. Exactly the one I was looking for. Makes me delete other similar apps on my phone and keep only this one, really. â— I love this app! It is clean, beautiful, very customizable, and user-friendly. I love the ability to make your own categories and accounts. And I also love the ability to put it in your pull-down Notification Center on your phone. It makes it quickly accessible during the day. Great job, love the app! Apple Watch: You can create incomes and expenses from your Apple Watch. The Glance shows your expenses of today, this month. Featureï¼š â— Three seconds only: pull down, fill money, choose category â— iOS notification center widget: you can easily account when iPhone lock screen â— Passcode security: everyone cannot open, only you. even double-click the Home button, in the App list can not view the data â— Support more than 160 kinds of currency, conversion exchange rate automatic updates â— Calculator: built-in calculator, more convenient and faster â— Full gestures: fast billing basic â— Humane beginners guide: for special operations, we guide the way through the animation + text, more intuitive, easier to understand â— iCloud backup & restore â— Dropbox backup & restore â— Export data to CSV via Email â— Recurring event, both expenses and incomes, with rich frequency options. â— Allow custom theme color and wallpaper. â— Allow add transaction from template. Basicï¼š â— Expense & Income bills can be added photos â— Income, Expense, Transfer, the others have â— Graphical reports, allowing you to easily view the balance of payments situation year / month / week â— Budget management: give yourself a reason to control consumption â— A variety of color themes and wallpaper, allows you to fully personalize â— Custom categories and consumption expenditure accounts, more in line with your needs â— Supports iPhone & iPad â— Daily reminder Increaseï¼š â— Easy copy history through gestures and automatically positioned in the day consumption date, you only need to modify the money can be. of course, you can use the existing money saved directly â— You can also add categories and account when billing editing, click on the banner to change currency If you give up because of difficulties If you give up because of busy If you want to know where expenses If you want to save money If ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ Try our "DayCost" it, she will be your best assistant URL Schemes: DayCost:// Help translate DayCost: Contribute to the DayCost translation in your language. Let's make DayCost available to everyone in the world! We will show translator's info in DayCost, if you so desire. In addition, we also give several redemption code as a gift. have any suggestions or comments, please write to usï¼šsupport@daycost.com

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

Download and play GTA: Vice City - Definitive for up to thirty minutes as a free trial. Purchase the full game as a one-time, in-app purchase to play without any time limits. GTA+ Members can enjoy unlimited access while subscribed for as long as it is included in GTA+. Welcome to the 1980s. From the decade of big hair and pastel suits comes the story of one man's rise to the top of the criminal pile. Grand Theft Auto returns with Tommy Vercettiâ€™s tale of betrayal and revenge in a neon-soaked tropical town full of excess and brimming with possibilities. Rockstar Games, Inc. 622 Broadway, New York, NY, 10012. Â© 2001â€“2023. Rockstar Games, Grand Theft Auto, Grand Theft Auto: Vice City and R* Logo are marks/logos/copyrights of Take-Two Interactive. entry.title: MagicKit Pro: AI Smart Toolbox
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º179,99 â†’ Free [Free ~ â‚º179,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

MagicKit AI â€“ All-in-One Device and Utility Toolkit MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life. Device and System Tools â€¢ Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state â€¢ Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage â€¢ Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details â€¢ Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running â€¢ Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage â€¢ Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space â€¢ Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries â€¢ RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance â€¢ Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance Network Tools â€¢ Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed â€¢ Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status â€¢ IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses â€¢ Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude Security & Privacy Tools â€¢ Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options â€¢ Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases â€¢ UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats â€¢ Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options â€¢ Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection Utility Tools â€¢ Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements â€¢ Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies â€¢ Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support â€¢ Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status â€¢ Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events â€¢ Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks â€¢ QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly â€¢ Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition â€¢ Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors â€¢ Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app â€¢ Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone â€¢ Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session â€¢ Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness â€¢ Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup â€¢ Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more Highlights â€¢ Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools â€¢ Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities â€¢ No ads or in-app purchases â€¢ Lightweight and battery-efficient â€¢ Compatible with all iOS devices â€¢ Frequent updates with new tools â€¢ Built with privacy and performance in mind â€¢ Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations Perfect for â€¢ Device monitoring and optimization â€¢ Everyday measurement and conversion tasks â€¢ Scanning documents and QR codes â€¢ Cleaning up photo storage and contacts â€¢ Creating and managing countdowns with reminders â€¢ Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters â€¢ Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control â€¢ Performing simple network diagnostics â€¢ Generating secure passwords and managing privacy â€¢ Taking quick notes and organizing information Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

entry.title: Pasha Planet: Reborn
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º179,99 â†’ â‚º99,99 [â‚º39,99 ~ â‚º179,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º99,99

Application Description

â€œPasha Planet: Rebornâ€ is the debut game of Scorpio Game, a Taiwanese independent game development studio. Prepare to be charmed by unique hand-painted scenes and have fun with light detective work, players will get to explore the main game plot that revolves around the charactersâ€™ daily life through an immersive and one-of-a-kind puzzle-solving gameplay. [Game Overview] The story takes place on the distant planet of Pasha. A prosperous underground city, which are inhabited by adorable doggies, can be found there. They live in peace day after day, enjoying the convenience brought about by technology. However, the protagonist Bobbie, who grew up in the city, often fantasizes about getting out of the closed-off Underground City to see the world outside. This is where the main story line of the game begins. Players will take on the role of Bobbie and explore the seemingly calm and peaceful city, which is in actual fact, facing an energy crisis. Players must clear stages of challenges to solve the final mystery and figure out a way to save all the inhabitants before disaster strikes! [Game Features] - Created by an independent game development studio in Taiwan. - Classic click-and-point puzzle-solving gameplay. - Charming and heartwarming hand-painted scenes. - Challenging puzzles and stages.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Little Big Workshop
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º69,99 â†’ â‚º11,99 [â‚º11,99 ~ â‚º69,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º11,99

Application Description

Imagine a magical factory, appearing right in your living room. A carefully planned masterpiece, where diligent workers throw together anything customers want. Rubber ducks and dressers, drones and electric guitars, scooters and other wonderful goods can be created from many different materials and sold for hard cash â€“ cash you invest right back into your factory to get more machines, more workers and grow your business. In Little Big Workshop you become a factory tycoon! Real factories - made FUN You are the Big Boss and itâ€™s time to take charge of your very own tabletop factory. Organize the factory floor, manage your workers, purchase machinery, and design efficient production lines - all within the time-limit and to your client's satisfaction! An open-ended sandbox-experience Take it easy, itâ€™s a sandbox-experience where you think, ponder and poke at things until you get it to work the way youâ€™d like. Supply products to clients and an ever-changing market, as you produce over 50 unique product types, built from multiple parts and pieces - all of which can be created with different materials and production methods. No two factories should ever look the same. Tiny hands, big dreams Start out with just a small workshop and expand to a desk-filling factory. Unlock ever fancier machines, add even more production methods, and most of all, more room. Soon enough youâ€™ll be running multiple production lines, producing hundreds of advanced products each day, and watching with joy as your cute workers do the actual work. Features: - Varying industries and a wide range of products - Focus on practical problems, not on values, economics, or logistics - Organize all steps of the production on a blueprint - Factories grow as you unlock more desk space - Fully simulated Day/Night-cycle - Take care of your workers! Work them too hard and they drop like flies - Cute model-town art-style

entry.title: Wreckfest
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º69,99 â†’ â‚º22,99 [â‚º11,99 ~ â‚º69,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º22,99

In-App Purchases

  • Content Bundle 2ï¼šâ‚º349,99
  • Content Bundle 1ï¼šâ‚º449,99
  • Getaway Car Packï¼šâ‚º129,99
  • Modified Monsters Car Packï¼šâ‚º129,99
  • Steel & Wheels Packï¼šâ‚º99,99
  • Off-Road Car Packï¼šâ‚º129,99
  • Racing Heroes Car Packï¼šâ‚º129,99
  • Rusty Rats Car Packï¼šâ‚º129,99
  • American All-Stars Car Packï¼šâ‚º129,99
  • Goofy Roofs Packï¼šâ‚º39,99

Application Description

Burn rubber and shred metal in the ultimate driving playground! Wreckfest is jam-packed with upgrade and customization options. Whether you are preparing for your next demolition derby with reinforced bumpers, roll cages, side protectors and much more, or setting your car up for a banger race with engine performance parts like air filters, camshafts, fuel systems, etc., Wreckfest is shaping up to be the best combative motorsport game out there. â€¢ Unique Racing Experience â€“ Exhilarating no-rules racing action with defining, once-in-a-lifetime moments that can be achieved only with a true-to-life physics simulation. Witness insane neck-to-neck fighting on high-speed circuits, face total destruction madness on crazy courses with intersections and oncoming traffic, or go for demolition dominance in derby arenas. â€¢ Awesome Cars â€“ Our cars are old, banged up, patched together... They ooze style and character! From old American heavy-hitters to agile Europeans and fun Asians, you wonâ€™t find anything like this in other games. â€¢ Meaningful Customization â€“ Change not only the look of your cars but also upgrade their body armor â€“ Reinforce them with heavy iron that protects you from damage, but also adds weight, which impacts the cars handling. Modify your car to make a robust tank or a fragile but lightning-fast rocket, or anything in between! â€¢ Multiplayer â€“ Wreck your friends in local multiplayer and take racing to the limit while chasing for demolition dominance! â€¢ Challenge modes â€“ Have hilarious fun with crop harvesters, lawn mowers, school buses, three-wheelers and much more! â€¢ Career Mode â€“ Battle for championships, earn experience, unlock new upgrades and cars, and become the all-time Wreckfest champion! Â© www.handy-games.com GmbH

entry.title: FocusDots Â· Focus What Matters
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º99,99 â†’ Free [Free ~ â‚º99,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

A Simple Time Management App That Will Increase Your Productivity Keeping yourself focused on tasks can be not easy sometimes. FocusDots is a beautifully designed timer to improve your focus on tasks and discard activity that can divert your attention. FocusDots is a simple time management app with four easy steps: 1) Decide on a single task to be done. 2) Start FocusDots and work on the task until the timer finishes (25 minutes). 3) Take a short break (5 minutes). 4) After completing four Dots, go for a longer break (15 minutes) Features - Elegant minimalist design - Daily Summary - Beautiful crafted design themes - Quotes to inspire and motivate you - Custom timer duration for your tasks Thank you for choosing FocusDots! We sincerely appreciate your support and hope that our app helps you enhance your productivity and time management skills. If you have any feedback or suggestions, we'd love to hear from you!
